Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25165 affecting package helm for versions less than 3.10.3-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-25165 affecting package helm for versions less than 3.10.3-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package helm is earlier than 3.10.3-3, affected by CVE-2023-25165
